vlive.korean: 혼혈 - 살짝 답하기 곤란한 것들이... Mixed-race. - Some of them are hard to answer. 듣기 View video X1 : 룸메즈🍒 + a
vlive.english: Mixed-race. - Some of them are hard to answer.

vlive.korean: [특히 긴장해서 성대가 굳어버린 두 영혼] 우리가 곤란한 거 물어볼까 봐 그래요? [The 2 souls have no voice because they're so tense] Is it because we might ask difficult questions? 듣기 View video 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) : 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) 41회 - (여자)아이들 아이돌룸 오프닝
vlive.english: [The 2 souls have no voice because they're so tense] Is it because we might ask difficult questions?

vlive.korean: 우리 서로 편하게 가자고요 곤란한 상황 만들지 말고. so let's make it comfortable for both of us. Don't create awkward situations. 듣기 View video iKON : 공지
vlive.english: so let's make it comfortable for both of us. Don't create awkward situations.

vlive.korean: 저희가 또 지금 이게 관계가 곤란한... - 메시지가 시공간을 뛰어넘기 좀... It's a difficult subject. - Messages can't go across time and space. 듣기 View video MONSTA X : [Replay] MONSTA X [THE CONNECT] COMEBACK SHOW
vlive.english: It's a difficult subject. - Messages can't go across time and space.
